description: This file defines a React component for an analytics page, utilizing various chart components (Line, Pie, Bar) from the 'recharts' library to visualize analytics data fetched from an API endpoint. It includes UI layout with metric cards and responsive charts, and defines a helper component 'MetricCard'.

methods.name: AnalyticsPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the analytics dashboard with charts and metrics.

methods.name: MetricCard
methods.description: Helper component to display individual metric labels and values.
